评论概述: NO TAG!  WHAT IS THE MATERIAL?
评论详情: Since everything is from China, I would at least like to see a tag stating the material in these.  No tag other than "china". I immediately started sneezing...when I looked through the garment for the tag that has the fabric.  I am not even going to try them on.  Buyer beware.
